annotation.spannedText: When people need advice about topics like health or careers, the first place they often look is the internet

classMention.mentionClass: When people need advice about topics like health or careers, the first place they often look is the internet

annotation.spannedText: Not only do vaccinations prevent the suffering and death associated with infectious diseases, they also help enable national priorities like education and economic development to take hold

classMention.mentionClass: Not only do vaccinations prevent the suffering and death associated with infectious diseases, they also help enable national priorities like education and economic development to take hold

annotation.spannedText: Every country should seek to achieve early and timely infant vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: Every country should seek to achieve early and timely infant vaccination

annotation.spannedText: All children worldwide should be immunized against tetanus

classMention.mentionClass: All children worldwide should be immunized against tetanus

annotation.spannedText: Other tetanus prevention efforts are also needed including individual and community education on clean wound care and the importance of following standard surgical protocols in accordance with WHO guidelines.

classMention.mentionClass: Other tetanus prevention efforts are also needed including individual and community education on clean wound care and the importance of following standard surgical protocols in accordance with WHO guidelines.
